::Battera::

She nods to Rex and watches him walk away.  She entered her room and 
closed the door behind her.  She set the bowl of fruit down on the 
table next to her chair.  She knew she would do more harm than good 
if she continued to interfere.  She knew the only way to stay out of 
everything was to sleep, and for a long time. She went over tot he 
bed and layed down.
She unfolded her wings and wrapped them tightly around her slender 
form, hugging the curves of her body.  "Battera, Hybernation mode."
Her body relaxed a little, but her wings were still tightly folded 
around her. Her head tilted to one side as she entered a deep sleep.
